TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed X509CrlRecordFields extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: X.509 certificate revocation list record fields.
Docs.remarks: The record fields are used when querying the for certificate revocation lists.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CrlRecordFields Crl = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The "crl" field stores the raw binary data of the certificate revocation list.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CrlRecordFields Id = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The "id" field is typically just the ROWID in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CrlRecordFields IsDelta = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The "delta" field is a boolean value indicating whether the certificate revocation list is a delta.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CrlRecordFields IssuerName = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The "issuer name" field stores the issuer name of the certificate revocation list.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CrlRecordFields NextUpdate = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The "next update" field stores the date and time of the next scheduled update.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CrlRecordFields ThisUpdate = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The "this update" field stores the date and time of the most recent update.
